about_the_game:
Welcome to Creatures 3!

Over a thousand years ago, the ancient civilisation of Shee left the world of Albia in a giant spaceship to find a new home. When the Grendels attacked them during the flight, they escaped to their new planet's surface, abandoning the Norns and their spaceship in orbit.

But the Norns are not alone, and with your help they can thrive. You'll find a host of advanced machines to help you - all of which can be plugged together to make huge automated devices. But watch out for Grendels, a breed of vicious mutants.

Remember, even in a virtual world there are real dangers!

  • Explore four entirely different ecosystems, and manage the ship using the engineering and bridge areas.
  • Three new breeds of Norn: Civet, Bengal and Bruin.
  • Meet the kleptomaniac Ettins and vicious Grendels!
  • Connecting agents allow you to take machines and plug them together to make super machines!
  • Analyse your Norn's chemistry in detail, and alter it directly.
  • Start a new world in Creatures Docking Station to combine it with Creatures 3 - and have more space for your Creatures than ever before!

These are not the Norns, Grendels and Ettins of Albia present - they are the creatures of Albia past. There are Grendels that will hunt your Norns down, steal their belongs and hurt them. Ettins that hoard machinery in their desert world. And frightened Norns - ready to discover the secrets of the Shee spaceship.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 95/98
  • Processor: Pentium 200 MMX or faster
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 MB 16-Bit SVGA display adapter
  • DirectX: Version 7.0a
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16-Bit sound card

short_description: Creatures 3 represents some of the most advanced artificial life available. The Norns, Grendels and Ettins behave as if they are really alive. Explore a vast living spaceship, discover incredible machines, and defend your Norns against vicious, hunting Grendels and some of nature's worst creations.
